articles.description: The singer, 27, spoke in a pre-recorded message where he told how one of his fondest memories from Radio 1 was stumbling into the studio with Nick, 36, after a drunken night at the BRITs.
articles.content:
Harry Styles fondly reminisced on the good times with his close friend Nick Grimshaw who hosted his final BBC Radio 1 show on Thursday. 
The singer, 27, spoke in a pre-recorded message where he told… [+17668 chars]
